metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Cha Gio  •  Ingredients:  o 1 package spring roll wrappers  o 1/2 pound ground pork  o 1/2 cup shrimp  o 1/2 cup mushrooms  o 1/4 cup carrots  o 1/4 cup green onions  o 2 cloves garlic  o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  o 1 tablespoon sugar  o Oil for frying  •  Instructions:  o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped  green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl.  o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.  o Fry in hot oil until golden.  o Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.

Veggie and Cheese Quesadilla  Ingredients:  •  1 whole wheat tortilla  •  1/2 cup shredded cheese  •  1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced  •  1/4 cup zucchini, sliced  •  1/4 cup red onion, sliced  Instructions:  •  Lay the tortilla flat and sprinkle half of the cheese on one side.  •  Add the bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion.  •  Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and fold the tortilla in half.  •  Cook in a skillet over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden  brown.  •  Slice into wedges.

Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl  Ingredients:  •  1 cup cottage cheese  •  1/4 cup diced cucumber  •  1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved  •  1/4 cup diced bell pepper  •  Salt and pepper to taste  Instructions:  •  In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper.  •  Season with salt and pepper.  •  Serve immediately.

Fattoush  •  Ingredients:  o 2 pita breads  o 4 tomatoes  o 1 cucumber  o 1 small red onion  o 1/4 cup parsley  o 1/4 cup mint  o 1/4 cup lemon juice  o 1/4 cup olive oil  o 1 teaspoon sumac  o 1 teaspoon salt  •  Instructions:  o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.  o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.  o Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.  o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.  o Toss well and serve.

Bobotie  •  Ingredients:  o 1 pound ground beef  o 1 small onion  o 2 cloves garlic  o 1/4 cup raisins  o 1/4 cup almonds  o 1 tablespoon curry powder  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  o 2 eggs  o 1/2 cup milk  o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs  •  Instructions:  o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).  o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.  o Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook until  beef is browned.  o Transfer mixture to a baking dish.  o Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture.  o Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.  o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden.  o Serve warm.
